name: Joined Parkour
description:
This is a parkour-platformer game where you use different portals to reach the end. There is no time limit or anything. You just have to reach to the end level portals to finish the level.  

This is our second game jam and also second game. We did everything we can in 48 hours. Your rate and comment is valuable for us to improve ourselves.

We couldn't make the game for lower than 1920x1080 screens. Sorry for that problem.
